name: Gobang - ample game resource
description:
Gobang is a very interesting game with strong AI and beautiful graphics. Especially it has rich of useful features. Let’s start to download it freely!

Main Features:
1. Strong AI engine, No matter you are expert or not, you can enjoy it with 5 levels AI.
2. A lot of game replays of Championships，you can study the master’s skill easily through them.
3. Many many of classical endgames, you can practice more.
4. Selected gobang books, you can study super skill and theory from books.
5. Very delicate music, believe you will like it!
